alert.note: Alert for Benson; Eddy; Towner (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 3:39AM CST until January 05 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Winds will slowly diminish this morning with lingering light snow and blowing snow thru mid morning. Otherwise today into tonight will see wind chills in the 25 below to 40 below zero range. * WHERE...Towner, Benson and Eddy Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 9 AM CST this morning. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 9 AM this morning to midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while outside. Wear appropriate winter clothing. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
